name: Stasis (itch) (ramjing)
description:
Long ago, there was a place where all kinds of beings lived in harmony. But one day, wizards declared war on each other and destroyed everything. You are the Wizard of Time who wants to fix the world. Get yourself a mana stone to help you revert everything to its original state.

Move leftMove RightStasisRewind every object in stasisResetRestart

  a key,  d key,  click lmb,  hold lmb
